code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Infra_EtcdCluster] --> active: Create Goal
    
    active --> paused: Pause Goal
    active --> cancelled: Cancel Goal (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    active --> completed: Complete Goal (Infra_IngressController)
    
    paused --> active: Resume Goal
    paused --> cancelled: Cancel Goal (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    paused --> completed: Complete Goal (Infra_RedisCache)
    
    completed --> [Infra_IngressController]: Final State
    cancelled --> [Infra_RedisCache]: Final State
    
    note right of active
        Default status for new goals
        Can update progress
        Deadline countdown active
    end note
    
    note right of paused
        Progress preserved
        Deadline countdown paused
        Can resume anytime
    end note
    
    note right of completed
        Final state
        Cannot change status
        Can archive/unarchive
        Data preserved
    end note
    
    note right of cancelled
        Final state
        Cannot reactivate
        Requires confirmation
        Data preserved for history
    end note
